question: Identify the incorrect statement: [cite: 371]
choices: Values of colligative properties of colloidal solution are of small order compared to values of true solution
Tyndall effect is observed only when diameter of the dispersed particles is not much smaller than wavelength of incident light
Colour of colloidal solution depends on the wavelength of light scattered by the dispersed particles
Brownian movement is due to balanced bombardment of molecules of dispersion medium on colloidal particles
explanation: Brownian movement is due to the *unbalanced* bombardment of molecules of the dispersion medium on colloidal particles, not balanced. [cite: 376]
